#labels Featured
==version 0.9.3==
 # iApp style scroll bars
 # {{{ImageButton}}} added which allows for buttons with non-rectangular hot-spots to be created from images
 # {{{SourceList}}} selected item not repainting properly on focus change fixed
 # {{{SourceList}}} doesn't automatically expand root node if items are added to the model after it has been made visible
 # {{{SourceListContextMenuProvider}}} introduced which allows developers to easily add custom context menus
 # {{{SourceListClickListener}}} introduced which allows developers to listen for multiple clicks on a {{{SourceList}}} item
 # {{{SourceList}}} was ignoring the requested insertion index into the {{{SourceList}}} after the {{{SourceListModel}}} had been installed
 # Removed setVisible(true) call from {{{HUDWindow}}} constructor
==version 0.9.2==
 # Heads Up Display (HUD)
 # Works with JGoodies Forms 1.2.1
 # Dependency on SwingX removed, thus reducing the size from 1.4 MB to 250 KB
 # {{{SourceListTreeUI}}} has been factored out of {{{SourceList}}} so that you can apply this UI delegate to any JTree
 # {{{EmphasizedLabelUI}}} now has Javadoc.
==version 0.9.1==
  # Unified Tool Bar
  # Bottom Bar
  # Java 6 compatibility on the Mac
  # Fixed {{{UnifiedToolBarButtonUI}}} disabled button masking
  # Added EXTRA_SMALL {{{BottomBarSize}}} (as seen in Safari's status bar)
